'''''The Open Door to Poetry: An Anthology''''' is a collection of poetry, first published in [[1931]]. The anthology includes [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s (acknowledged as "[[J.R.R. Tolkein]]") poem "[[Goblin Feet]]".<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1062&forum=9&post_id=5108#forumpost5108|articlename='Goblin Feet' sighting|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=8 February 2013}}</ref>
